title: How Do Big Plants Grow From Such Small Seeds?
description: Why are there so many plants? How are seeds made? How does germination work? How can plants grow so big if they start from such a small seed? Why are flowers different colors? Why are plants and trees green? Where does dirt come from? In this episode of But Why , we're talking about plants with garden consultant Charlie Nardozzi.
itunes:subtitle: Why are there so many plants? How are seeds made? How does germination work? How can plants grow so big if they start from such a small seed?
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
